name: Tally Ho
introduce: Tally Ho is an open source decentralized Web3 wallet that supports Chrome and Brave browsers, will have NFT gallery displays, support for ledger accounts, cheap Swaps with no hidden fees, and is governed by the community. A unique feature of the Tally Ho wallet is that it allows users to view all accounts in one view. The overview page becomes very useful when users have multiple wallet addresses and multiple assets in these accounts. The overview feature provides users with a single view of all accounts to obtain the total balance of all assets in all accounts.
